summary: The story of a Spanish gentlemen gone mad and his dim-witted squire sancho panza, who set forth on a journey to right wrongs and accomplish good deeds in the name of chivalry.
cast: Francisco Reiguera|Akim Tamiroff|Pepe Mediavilla|Juan Carlos Ordóñez|Constantino Romero|Paola Mori|Juan Serrano|Beatrice Welles|Oja Kodar|Edward Marcus|Fernando Rey|Allan Wenger
keywords: don quixote|don quixote character|sancho panza character|sancho panza|windmill
title: Don Quijote de Orson Welles
